generate andesite stone
host
harvestLevel 1
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/stone/strong/andesite
convertsTo minecraft:stone 5

harvestLevel 1
hardness 2.5
texture strata:overlays/cobble normal 95 strata:blocks/stone/strong/andesite

harvestLevel 1
hardness 2.5
texture strata:overlays/mossy_cobble normal 100 strata:overlays/cobble normal 95 strata:blocks/stone/strong/andesite

harvestLevel 1
